name: hack-club-arcade

author: d99-1

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Manage Session
commands.description: Manage your Arcade session from the menu bar

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Your Hack Club Arcade API token
preferences.placeholder: Run /api in #arcade on Slack to get your API token

preferences.name: userid
preferences.title: Slack User ID

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
